name: chivalrously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a man behaves chivalrously, he behaves in a polite and kind way towards women: "After you," he said chivalrously, holding open the door. He chivalrously came to her defence when they criticized her. See
chivalrous
More examplesFewer examplesShe tripped and fell on the uneven pavement, and a young man chivalrously helped her up.He chivalrously opened the car door for his sister.After chivalrously allowing women and children to leave, the militia attacked the town.
